revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== {{confix|en|xeno|geneic}} ===Adjective=== {{en-adj|-}} # {{lb|en|genetics}} Derived from a different [[species]] and therefore [[genetically]] and [[immunologically]] [[incompatible]] #* {{quote-journal|1=en|year=2000|author=Kanazawa A.|author2=Platt J.L.|title= Prospects for xenotransplantation of the liver |journal=Seminars in liver disease|doi=10.1055/s-2000-13159|text=Among the types of [[xenograft|xenografts]] that might be undertaken are [[extracorporeal]] "xenoperfusion" or perfusion of devices containing '''xenogeneic''' [[hepatocytes]], auxiliary liver transplants, bridge liver transplants, and hepatocyte transplants.}} ====Derived terms==== * [[nonxenogeneic]] * [[xenogeneic transplantation]] ====See also==== * [[allogeneic]] * [[autologous]] * [[syngeneic]] * [[xenogenic]]
